Rule.Filter: ([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and not ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')
([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([tunnel]='yes' or [tunnel]='true')

Datasource.Parameter: (select * from planet_osm_polygon order by z_order,way_area desc) as leisure
(select * from planet_osm_polygon where landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' or "natural"='land' order by z_order) as water
(select * from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NOT NULL or landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' order by z_order) as water
(select * from planet_osm_line order by z_order) as roads
(select * from planet_osm_line where highway='track') as tracks
(select * from planet_osm_line order by z_order) as roads
(select * from planet_osm_roads order by z_order) as roads
(select * from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NOT NULL or landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' order by z_order) as water
(select * from planet_osm_line order by z_order) as roads
(select * from planet_osm_line where "railway"='tram' order by z_order) as trams
(select * from planet_osm_point where amenity IS NOT NULL or railway is NOT NULL or "natural" is NOT NULL or man_made is NOT NULL or highway is NOT NULL or aeroway is NOT NULL) as amenity
(select way from planet_osm_line where "power"='line') as power
(select way from planet_osm_point where power='tower') as power_towers
(select way,highway,landuse,"natural",man_made,waterway,name,ref,char_length(ref) as length from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL) as roads

(select way,highway,landuse,"natural",man_made,waterway,tourism,amenity,place,name,ref,oneway,char_length(ref) as length from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL) as roads
(select * from planet_osm_polygon order by z_order,way_area desc) as leisure
(select way,admin_level from planet_osm_roads where "boundary"='administrative') as admin
